content.rendered:
Administrative Assistant | Tulsa, OK

– Filing – Data Entry – Printing checks in QuickBooks – Other administrative duties as assigned

Requirements:

– Must be very proficient in Microsoft Excel – Some experience with QuickBooks is preferred – Able to multi-task  – Respectful & Professional at all times – Able to handle confidential information – Self-motivated – Problem-solver – Good time management
